newsitem.title: USA: Wells Fargo Q4 shr $1.12 vs $6.29.
newsitem.headline: Wells Fargo Q4 shr $1.12 vs $6.29.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: Earnings before amortization of goodwill and nonqualifying core deposit intangibles were $2.41 per share for the 1996 Q4.
Net interest income was $1.253 billion in Q4 of 1996. Net interest margin for Q4 of 1996 was 6.14 percent.
Noninterest income in Q4 was $564 million. In 1996 Q4, Wells recorded a $103 million accrual for the expected loss on the disposition of branches.

"Since the company's results for the fourth quarter of 1996 and the full year reflect the effects of the First Interstate merger beginning April 1, 1996, these results are not comparable to the reported results for the corresponding prior periods of 1995," Wells Fargo said.
